column4: If I burn an Ubuntu Feisty Desktop install CD image to a DVD it will work exactly the same as if I had used a CD, won't it? (my burner is behaving a bit temperamental about CDs lately)
it would, but then may i suggest you get the dvd images instead?
correction: it _should_. ive not tried it :)
: thanks, I'll download the DVD image then to be sure =)
